front.title: ••Laser Gate
front.gametext: Deploy between any two interior mobile sites. To pass, a character must have (power + ability) > 4 or use a Lift Tube (all other vehicles are blocked). Laser Gate defense value = 3; may be targeted (as if a character) by a character weapon from either site.
front.lore: Security corridors are guarded by a grid of laser emplacements which can be activated upon demand to seal off sensitive areas from intrusion.

pulledBy: There Is No Try & Oppressive Enforcement (V)
